title: Being and doing
brief_description: In this collaboration between one of Britain’s leading performance artists, Stuart Brisley and a major independent film-maker, records of Performance Art have been extensively manipulated; the images slowed down, fragmented, and details isolated to construct a filmic ‘memory’ of the events.
